mmr.description: MMR vaccine protects against measles, mumps, and rubella, which are contagious viral diseases.

covid-19.description: COVID-19 vaccines help protect against severe illness caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

influenza.description: Influenza vaccine helps protect against seasonal flu viruses that infect the nose, throat, and lungs.

tetanus.description: Tetanus vaccine protects against tetanus, a serious disease caused by bacteria entering through cuts or wounds.

hepatitis b.description: Hepatitis B vaccine protects against a serious liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus.

hepatitis a.description: Hepatitis A vaccine protects against a contagious liver disease caused by the hepatitis A virus.

typhoid.description: Typhoid vaccine protects against typhoid fever, a bacterial infection spread through contaminated food and water.

rabies.description: Rabies vaccine protects against rabies virus infection, which is transmitted by animal bites.

japanese encephalitis.description: Japanese encephalitis vaccine protects against a viral brain infection spread by mosquitoes in Asia.

yellow fever.description: Yellow fever vaccine protects against a viral disease transmitted by mosquitoes, common in parts of Africa and South America. It is often required for travelers arriving from risk countries.

polio.description: Polio vaccine protects against poliomyelitis, a viral disease that can cause paralysis. Required in some countries for travelers coming from outbreak areas.

cholera.description: Cholera vaccine protects against cholera, a bacterial infection causing severe diarrhea and dehydration, spread through contaminated water or food.

meningococcal vaccine.description: Meningococcal vaccine protects against meningococcal disease, a serious bacterial infection. Required for pilgrims attending Hajj or Umrah in Saudi Arabia.
